pergunta: Qual era o nome do líder durante a Grande Depressão e a Segunda Guerra Mundial?;James Bryant Conant. This refers to the university president during those times. James Conant was indeed the President of Harvard from 1933 to 1953, which covers both the Great Depression and World War II.

Que organização Harvard encontrou em 1900?;Associação de Universidades Americanas. I recall that in 1900, Harvard helped found the Association of American Universities (AAU), a group of leading research universities. So this makes sense as the answer.

Qual presidente da universidade a transformou em uma moderna universidade de pesquisa?;Charles W. Eliot. Charles Eliot was president from 1869 to 1909 and is credited with transforming Harvard into a major research university through curriculum reforms and expansion.
